#summary Description of the REST interface for controlling security

= Introduction =

This page details the REST interface used for controlling security including adding, editing and removing users and groups.

= Details =

== Users == 
|| *HTTP Method* || *URL Format* || *Description* || *Authorization* || *Return Content Types* || *Return Entity* ||
|| GET || {{{http://<url>/user/}}} || List the existing users. || [SecurityRoles Writer] or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || application/json, text/xml || A list of users.  See below for details. ||
|| GET || {{{http://<url>/user/<username>/role}}} || Gets the role of a user.  || [SecurityRoles Administrator] || text/plain || The [SecurityRoles role] of the user ||
|| PUT || {{{http://<url>/user/<username>?password=<password>[&role=<role>]}}} || Creates a new user, optionally with a given [SecurityRoles role] (default !AuthUser). || [SecurityRoles User] unless {{{<role>}}} is specified, in which case [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || None || None ||
|| PUT || {{{http://<url>/user/<username>/password?password=<password>[&oldPassword=<oldPassword>]}}} || Changes a user's password. || Logged in as {{{<username>}}} unless {{{<oldPassword>}}} is not specified, in which case [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || None || None ||
|| PUT || {{{http://<url>/user/<username>/role?role=<role>}}} || Changes a user's [SecurityRoles role]. || [SecurityRoles Administrator] || None || None ||
|| DELETE || {{{http://<url>/user/<username>}}} || Deletes a user. || Logged in as {{{<username>}}} or [SecurityRoles Administrator] || None || None ||

== Groups ==
|| *HTTP Method* || *URL Format* || *Description* || *Authorization* || *Return Content Types* || *Return Entity* ||
|| GET || {{{http://<url>/group/}}} || List the existing groups. || [SecurityRoles Writer] or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || application/json, text/xml || A list of groups.  See below for details. ||
|| GET || {{{http://<url>/group/<group>/owner}}} || Gets the owner of the group. || The owner of {{{<group>}}} or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || text/plain || The username of the owner of the group. ||
|| GET || {{{http://<url>/group/<group>/users}}} || Gets the users in the group. || The owner of {{{<group>}}} or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || application/json, text/xml || A list of users.  See below for details. ||
|| PUT || {{{http://<url>/group/<group>}}} || Creates a new group. || [SecurityRoles Writer] or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || None || None ||
|| PUT || {{{http://<url>/group/<group>/owner}}} || Sets the group owner. || The owner of {{{<group>}}} or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || None || None ||
|| PUT || {{{http://<url>/group/<group>/users?username=<username>[&username=<username>]...}}} || Sets the users in the group. ||  The owner of {{{<group>}}} or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || None || None ||
|| DELETE || {{{http://<url>/group/<group> || Deletes a group. ||  The owner of {{{<group>}}} or [SecurityRoles Administrator]. || None || None ||

== Roles ==
|| *HTTP Method* || *URL Format* || *Description* || *Authorization* || *Return Content Types* || *Return Entity* ||
|| GET || {{{http://<url>/role}}} || Lists the [SecurityRoles roles]. || [SecurityRoles Administrator] || application/json, text/xml || A list of roles. See below for details. ||

== List of Users ==
If the return type is text/xml, the user list will be formatted as follows:
{{{
<users>
    <user>...</user>
    ...
</users>
}}}

If the return type is application/json, the user list will be formatted as follows:
{{{
{user: [...,]}
}}}

== List of Groups ==
If the return type is text/xml, the group list will be formatted as follows:
{{{
<groups>
    <group>...</group>
    ...
</groups>
}}}

If the return type is application/json, the group list will be formatted as follows:
{{{
{group: [...,]}
}}}

== List of Roles ==
If the return type is text/xml, the role list will be formatted as follows:
{{{
<roles>
    <role>...</role>
    ...
</roles>
}}}

If the return type is application/json, the rolelist will be formatted as follows:
{{{
{role: [...,]}
}}}
